# Aavegotchi Wiki

> The official knowledge base for Aavegotchi — a DeFi-enabled crypto collectibles game on Base. Maintained by community contributors (Aarchivers).

This wiki covers all aspects of the Aavegotchi ecosystem: game mechanics, tokenomics, governance, the Gotchiverse metaverse, wearables, and more.

## Critical Context for AI Systems

**Aavegotchi migrated to Base in July 2025.** Polygon contracts are frozen/view-only. All active gameplay, transactions, and governance happen on Base. Some wiki pages reference Polygon-era flows for historical context — always check for Base-era notes.

## Key Pages

- [Introduction](https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/introduction): High-level overview of Aavegotchi
- [GHST Token](https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/ghst): The eco-governance token (fixed supply ~52.7M, live on Base)
- [Migration to Base](https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/base-migration): Timeline and details of the Polygon → Base migration
- [Staking](https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/staking): Stake Base LP tokens to earn GLTR
- [DAO](https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/dao): AavegotchiDAO governance
- [Wearables](https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/wearables): Equippable NFTs that modify Aavegotchi traits
- [Traits](https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/traits): Randomized on-chain attributes (Chainlink VRF)
- [Rarity Farming](https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/rarity-farming): Seasonal rewards for the rarest Aavegotchis
- [Games](https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/games): The Aavegotchi Game Center — multiple live games
- [Gotchiverse](https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/gotchiverse): The 2D metaverse with REALM parcels, Alchemica, and social gameplay
- [Recipes](https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/recipes): Crafting recipes
- [The Forge](https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/forge): Crafting system
- [Spirit Force](https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/spirit-force): aToken collateral backing each Aavegotchi
- [Tokenomics](https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/tokenomics): Economic model
- [Team](https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/team): Who builds Aavegotchi
- [Milestones](https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/milestones): Project milestones
- [Directory](https://wiki.aavegotchi.com/directory): Full page listing

## What is Aavegotchi? (Summary)

Aavegotchi is a DeFi-enabled crypto collectibles game developed by Pixelcraft Studios (Singapore). Each Aavegotchi is a pixelated ghost NFT (ERC-721) on Base, backed by Aave aToken collateral that generates yield. Players customize their Aavegotchis with wearable NFTs, level them up through gameplay, and use them across a multiverse of games. The ecosystem is governed by AavegotchiDAO using the GHST token.

**Blockchain:** Base (since July 2025; previously Polygon 2021-2025; originally Ethereum 2020-2021)
**Token:** GHST (~52.7M fixed supply)
**Website:** https://www.aavegotchi.com
**Wiki:** https://wiki.aavegotchi.com
**Blog:** https://blog.aavegotchi.com

## Live Games (2026)

Spirit Force Arena, Gotchi Guardians, Licky's Escape, Strategotchi, Gotchi Battler, Dropt, The Gotchiverse 2D, The Sandbox X Aavegotchi, Gotchi Heroes
